theImmortal:FlameSling.NAME: Flame Sling
theImmortal:FlameSling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theimmortal:Ignite and 1 Vulnerable. NL theimmortal:Burst: Draw 2 cards.

theImmortal:Scorch.NAME: Scorch
theImmortal:Scorch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL theimmortal:Burst: Deal !D! damage.

theImmortal:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
theImmortal:Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw !M! card.

theImmortal:SpontaneousCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Combustion
theImmortal:SpontaneousCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

theImmortal:Expiation.NAME: Expiation
theImmortal:Expiation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and heal !M! HP for each Attack played this turn.

theImmortal:RecklessDive.NAME: Reckless Dive
theImmortal:RecklessDive.DESCRIPTION: Put the next !M! Attacks of your draw pile into your hand and lose HP equal to their combined cost.

theImmortal:Flare.NAME: Flare
theImmortal:Flare.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to all HP lost this combat to ALL enemies. NL (Currently: !theImmortal:M2!)
theImmortal:Flare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to all HP lost this combat + !D! to ALL enemies. NL (Currently: !theImmortal:M2!)

theImmortal:RecklessAttack.NAME: Reckless Attack
theImmortal:RecklessAttack.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play costs 0. Lose HP equal to !M! times its original energy cost instead.

theImmortal:ImperishableShooting.NAME: Imperishable Shooting
theImmortal:ImperishableShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Increase this card's hit count by !theImmortal:M2! this combat.
theImmortal:ImperishableShooting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Increase this card's hit count by !theImmortal:M2! this combat.

theImmortal:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
theImmortal:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Summon a theimmortal:Full_Flame.
theImmortal:Mirage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Summon a theimmortal:Full_Flame. NL theimmortal:Burst: Until the end of your turn, transfer card HP loss to a random theimmortal:Flame.

theImmortal:Kindle.NAME: Kindle
theImmortal:Kindle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL theimmortal:Burst: Heal !theImmortal:M2! HP

theImmortal:Channel.NAME: Channel
theImmortal:Channel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL theimmortal:Burst: Heal !M! HP for each enemy hit.

theImmortal:RetreatingStrike.NAME: Retreating Strike
theImmortal:RetreatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theimmortal:Burst: Gain Block equal to the damage dealt.

theImmortal:Updraft.NAME: Updraft
theImmortal:Updraft.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal HP equal to !M! times the amount of cards with a HP cost in your deck.

theImmortal:BlisteringRush.NAME: Blistering Rush
theImmortal:BlisteringRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL theimmortal:Burst: Apply !M! theimmortal:Ignite to ALL enemies.

theImmortal:FireTailLash.NAME: Fire Tail Lash
theImmortal:FireTailLash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply theimmortal:Ignite equal to the damage dealt. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theImmortal:FalseIgnition.NAME: False Ignition
theImmortal:FalseIgnition.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.
theImmortal:FalseIgnition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

theImmortal:ImmortalFlame.NAME: Immortal Flame
theImmortal:ImmortalFlame.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card would leave your hand, return it to your hand and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theImmortal:RetravelingOldRoads.NAME: Peregrinate
theImmortal:RetravelingOldRoads.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. Increase the amount of scryed cards by !theImmortal:M2! this combat. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

theImmortal:Caprice.NAME: Caprice
theImmortal:Caprice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you lose HP, draw !M! cards.
